short_summary: Aviation replacement parts for CC-138 Twin Otter for the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 4
description: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP). The Department of National Defence is seeking Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC-138 Twin Otter. This procurement is open to only Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.  Bidders are advised that Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.
full_summary:
## Aviation Replacement Parts for CC-138 Twin Otter

### **Request for Proposal (RFP) Brief**

The Department of National Defence hereby invites qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to submit proposals for the procurement of Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC-138 Twin Otter. The solicitation is for the provision of six (6) items.

#### Description of Requirement

The CC-138 Twin Otter is a Canadian government aircraft that requires regular maintenance and replacement of its parts. The Department of National Defence has identified a need for the acquisition of the following parts:

* [Insert list of required parts]

#### Invitation to Qualified SA Holders

Only qualified SA Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series are invited to submit proposals. The following companies have been formally invited:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* Bristow
* Honeywell Ltd
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Kenn Borek Air
* Mattis Aerospace
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Tower Aerospace Inc.

#### Instructions to Respondents

Proponents will receive RFP documents via email directly from the Contracting Officer. It is not possible to obtain all documents from GETS. 

All inquiries should be addressed to:

Air Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
Email: Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (819) 939-6082

#### Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification

A separate notice will be posted regularly on GETS to allow additional suppliers to become eligible for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.

#### Contracting Entity Information

* Department of National Defence
* Address: 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* Contact: Ivan Khanzadeev, ivan.khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca, (819) 939-6082

Note: The Division is working remotely due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The best method of contact is via email.

#### Essential Information

* Solicitation Number:  W8485-248080/A
* Notice Type:  Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Trade Agreements:   *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions
